SEARCH
Package AdventureModel

Class AchievableAction

java.lang.Object
AdventureModel.ObservableAchievement
AdventureModel.AchievableAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AchievableAction extends ObservableAchievement implements Serializable
This class extends ObservableAchievement, and can be observed by AchievementObserver objects. This class is used to represent an action that can be performed by the player, and is used to notify AchievementObserver objects when the action has been performed so that they can update their state accordingly.
See Also:

  • AchievementState
  • AchievementObserver
